register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Secure your systems with intelligence: sign up and analyze vulnerabilities in seconds.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your security dashboard.

messages.username_invalid: Username must be a string between 3 and 20 characters long, containing letters, numbers, dashes, or underscores
messages.password_invalid: Password must meet the following requirements:
messages.role_unknown: Unknown role. Please contact the administrator.
messages.connection_error: Could not connect to the server.
messages.error_generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Choose what you want to do

home.title: Welcome to VulnScanner
home.description: Easily manage, import, and analyze software vulnerabilities. A professional platform for IT administrators and cybersecurity experts.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.subtitle: Manage import and configuration of system data.

detector.title: Configuration Detector
detector.subtitle: Download and run the tool to automatically generate your system configuration.
detector.step1: Run the 'ConfigDetector.exe' file on your computer.
detector.step2: The configuration file 'system_config.json' will be generated in the same directory.
detector.step3_prefix: Upload the 'system_config.json' file to VulnScanner via
detector.step3_link: Dashboard > My Devices > Create New Device

cve.title: CVE Management
cve.import_error_message: An error occurred during the import.
cve.checking_nvd: Checking new CVEs availables at NVD...
cve.no_new_cves: DB up to date. There are no new CVEs to import.
cve.too_many_new: There are too many new CVEs.
cve.nothing_to_delete: There are no CVEs to delete in DB.
cve.delete_and_reimport_suggestion: Please delete all existing records and re-import from scratch.
cve.subtitle: Manage import and removal of vulnerabilities from official sources.

cpe.subtitle: Import CPE platforms from XML
